definition: the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth, derive or receive pleasure from
details:
noun
- the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: nip
verb
- derive or receive pleasure from
= synonyms: relish
- taste appreciatively
= synonyms: savor
- give taste to
= synonyms: savor
- have flavor
= synonyms: taste
